p:
In the proposed MNN algorithm, the training model runs a sequence of binary classifiers and trains each to decide a separate classification outcome according to the softmax activation function results. The architecture of the proposed MNN is a fully connected layers network with one hidden layer contains 50 nodes, and an output layer with 8 nodes each one represents an output class. The outputs of the hidden layer
